p: Plasma technology is now being considered as an alternative. Blood is collected from a person who has recovered from COVID-19. Separation of serum and screening is done for virus-neutralising antibodies. Convalescent serum, rich in antibodies for the pathogen, is then administered to a COVID-19 patient, who thus acquires passive immunity (Ivan et al. 2011; Duan et al. 2020; Bethany and Mc Cullough 2020; Paital et al. 2020; Singhal 2020).
